aurelia.autocomplete.bindings.data.name: bind
aurelia.autocomplete.bindings.data.documentation: automatically chooses the binding mode. Uses two-way binding for form controls and to-view/one-way binding for almost everything else

aurelia.autocomplete.bindings.data.name: to-view
aurelia.autocomplete.bindings.data.documentation: flows data one direction: from the view-model to the view

aurelia.autocomplete.bindings.data.name: one-way
aurelia.autocomplete.bindings.data.documentation: [deprecated, use to-view instead] flows data one direction: from the view-model to the view
aurelia.autocomplete.bindings.data.label: .one-way='' [deprecated]

aurelia.autocomplete.bindings.data.name: from-view
aurelia.autocomplete.bindings.data.documentation: flows data one direction: from the view to the view-model

aurelia.autocomplete.bindings.data.name: two-way
aurelia.autocomplete.bindings.data.documentation: flows data both ways: from view-model to view and from view to view-model

aurelia.autocomplete.bindings.data.name: one-time
aurelia.autocomplete.bindings.data.documentation: flows data one direction: from the view-model to the view, once
